title: hackd
body: i click a link and i know my pass ward and i cant log in  can you help pls

replies.body: We can help!  Fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team will assist you directly with getting it back in your hands!

About a year ago, my main account was hacked, and i lost access to it, i was told after a certain time, i could get the account reset to the original user, password, and email, provided i proved the account was mine. I wasnt sure if this was true, but if so, i wanted to see if i could get my old user name back (probably on my new main account) and see if it was possible to be refunded on the things i spent RP on.
